It is very good movie, I like it very much. I have waited for this day for forever. Very happy with movie.

I'm going to try very hard to avoid being hyperbolic, but this "movie" pushes your sanity to the edge, so I may fail despite a sincere effort... This isn't the worst movie I've ever seen, it's probably not in my top 10. However, this is the most shameless, desperate and sad effort I can imagine.

The premise reeks of corporate group-think, trying to find something young and widespread, followed by some jackass who blurts out "I got it!". He looks ahead and pauses, building suspense before he puts forth his great epiphany. He says one word: emojis! The group loves the idea, everyone gets excited because teens love their phones and use emojis, we'll be rolling in money for sure. We'll sell toys, have a spinoff t.v. show, sequels galore!!

This project is an insult to movie-goers. Every single person associated with this dumpster fire should feel shame.

Completely half assed storytelling that didn't even make any sense in the end.  If this movie had a message, it's that it's okay to have a phone that's broken and randomly does stuff it shouldn't. Meh is exactly what this movie is. ??

One of the best films I've ever seen!!! 
The plot is just amazing! And the animation is beautiful! The acting of the voice actors is just incredible! July 28th is now my favorite day of all, being the day that god came to earth, bringing to us the best movie ever made!! A masterpiece! One of the most fun and exciting films ever!! A film with precise lines, that captures very imprecise human emotions!!! One of the most artful, sensitive and intellectual movies I've ever seen!!
best movie I've ever seen. has an amazing story and effects. 11/10 would watch again
